page.title: 07Markyate Brownies
page.content: {BROWNIES In Markyate we have two{Brownie}packs. This is because there are so many people who want to be members.They meet on Mondays but there are two sessions.The first session is from 4.30 to 6.00 and the second session is from 6.00 to 7.30. They meet at the Youth and Community Centre. Subsriptions are 25p per week. Each pack is divided into groups of 6 known as "sixes" with names such as Gnomes, Pixes, Elves, Leprechauns, Sprites, Goblins, Imps and Kelpies. Each group is led by a different leader called a "Brown Owl". Each week they play games such as "Yes and No", "Cat and Mouse", "Sausages" and "Noughts and Crosses". On fine days they go to the fields and play.
